title: 100% Packet Loss, Constant DCing, Please Help!
body: So recently I've been hitting the thousands in ping during games and constantly disconnecting. Some games there's little lag at all, but most are plagued with disconnecting every 4-5 minutes. As a result I installed the Hextech Repair Tool, ran it, and I received the linked task log (imgur), which states how I receive 0 of 4 packets in my LoL client? I'm not sure what to do, please help!

replies.body:
Lag spikes like this can indicate an unstable connection, often locally, that's struggling to reach our services.  In this case, the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) might offer a better overview of what's happening specific to you.  The results should also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your case as well.

In the case that the issue continues, though, grab those logs from the HRT and attach it to a ticket so our tech team can help!
